title: Mujikaku Na Tensai Madougushi Wa Nonbiri Kurashitai
alternative_title: 無自覚な天才魔導具師はのんびり暮らしたい
status: 無自覚な天才魔導具師はのんびり暮らしたい
description:
Description :
        Freya, the youngest to join the court as a court magician, is harassed by her superiors who are jealous of her talent, and she is forced to perform hard work every day. She was at her wits' end when her fiancé, her only support, broke off their engagement. Freya saves Julius from the curse with the power of a magical tool she made, and is appointed as a special court magician for the second prince. While helping Julius, who supports the country from behind the scenes, Freya gradually becomes attracted to Julius. She embarks on a dungeon expedition with Julius, but...?
